title: James Quilter Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by James Quilter? Check out all of James Quilter's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogJames Quilter Senior Content Marketing Manager James Quilter James is a former marketing journalist turned content strategist. He has over 15 years of experience in B2B – working with top tech companies to craft compelling content to inform, engage and drive growth. When James is not immersed in an upcoming Similarweb campaign, you'll find him making noise on his guitars ("my content is better than my playing") or cycling the trails outside London. James started his content journey with a journalism post-grad at the London College of Communication. Show more Marketing Intelligence Missed brightonSEO?
